[[col:green]]Complete Jaffar's Revenge by uniting all of Araby and conquering Estalia, Tilea and Bretonnia to earn great rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_caravan_cargo]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Send trade caravans across the world via [[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Jellaba's Way[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and navigate risks en route to reap great financial rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Capture[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_slaves]]Slaves[[/sl_link]] [[col:green]]to receive greater bonuses from certain buildings, enable instant building construction, barter for powerful items in the Grand Bazaar, or instantly recruit Slave Rabble units. Use Diktats to maintain slave population and gain additional effects.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]The nobles of Araby are constantly warring with each other. Both the [[img:icon_urban_elites]][[/img]]Urban Elites and the [[img:icon_nomad_chiefs]][[/img]]Nomad Chiefs vie for control. The influence of either side is strengthened by constructing urban or nomadic aligned buildings. When one side gains the upper hand, you receive greater bonuses from certain buildings.[[/col]]

[[img:icon_pirate_crew]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Use your faction leader’s access to[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ship_building]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ship_building}}]]shipbuilding[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]to upgrade their ship’s features, unlocking units and providing bonuses for the ship and crew.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_infamy]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Increase your[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_infamy]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_infamy}}]]Infamy[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]rank throughout the campaign and attain possession of the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_sea_shanties]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_sea_shanties}}]]Lost Sea Shanty[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]verses to wield in battle, drawing the attention of surpassed rivals.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_treasure_map]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Seek out riches hinted at by[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_treasure_maps]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_treasure_maps}}]]Treasure Maps[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]or defeat rival pirates to obtain individual[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_pieces_of_eight]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_pieces_of_eight}}]]Pieces of Eight[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and the[[/col]] [[sl:campaign_regiments_of_renown]]Royal Djinn[[/sl]] [[col:green]]bound to them.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Capture[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_slaves]]Slaves[[/sl_link]] [[col:green]]to receive greater bonuses from certain buildings, enable instant building construction, barter for powerful items in the Grand Bazaar, or instantly recruit Slave Rabble units. Use Diktats to maintain slave population and gain additional effects.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]The nobles of Araby are constantly warring with each other. Both the [[img:icon_urban_elites]][[/img]]Urban Elites and the [[img:icon_nomad_chiefs]][[/img]]Nomad Chiefs vie for control. The influence of either side is strengthened by constructing urban or nomadic aligned buildings. When one side gains the upper hand, you receive greater bonuses from certain buildings.[[/col]]

[[col:green]]Decide [[img:icon_fatandira_allegiance]][[/img]]Fatandira's Allegiance — side with her god, the Tomb King Tutankhanut, or the people of Araby. Both sides offer unique rewards for your faction, from campaign buffs to powerful Royal Djinn or Tomb King Construct units. Your allegiance shifts by constructing certain buildings, winning battles and other deeds.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]Barter money and resources for powerful items at the Grand Bazaar.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:green]]The nobles of Araby are constantly warring with each other. Both the [[img:icon_urban_elites]][[/img]]Urban Elites and the [[img:icon_nomad_chiefs]][[/img]]Nomad Chiefs vie for control. The influence of either side is strengthened by constructing urban or nomadic aligned buildings. When one side gains the upper hand, you receive greater bonuses from certain buildings.[[/col]]
